short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sword Art Online Wallpaper turn new tab to custom Sword Art Online background. Sword Art Online wallpaper theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Sword Art Online wallpapers with every new tab.  
2. Randomize Sword Art Online backgrounds or mark favorites using the wallpaper selection panel.  
3. Integrated search bar powered by Google.  
4. Quick links to your email and social media accounts.  
5. Displays current date and time automatically.  
6. Built-in notes feature for jotting down tasks.  
7. Convenient access to your most visited websites.  
8. Easy navigation to your bookmarks.  
9. Add websites to the Shortcut panel for faster access.  
10. Quick links to Google apps.  
11. Access a variety of additional themes with ease.  
12. One-click social media sharing.  
13. Download wallpapers instantly.  
14. Direct access to play games.  
15. Enable fun animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks in the Sword Art Online new tab.
